title: Prison living costs rule scrapped for wrongly convicted
description: People like Andy Malkinson, who cleared his name after 17 years in jail, will no longer pay "bed and board".

title: Italian fugitive caught in Corfu thanks to photo celebrating football win
description: Vincenzo La Porta has been on the run for 11 years but was tracked down to Corfu by police.

title: Ukraine war: Russia hits blood transfusion centre, says Zelensky
description: People have been reportedly killed and wounded in the strike in north-eastern Ukraine, says the president.

title: Cycling World Championships 2023: GB win women's team pursuit as they maintain fine start with five golds on day three
description: Great Britain maintain their fine start to the Cycling World Championships winning five golds, two silver medals and a bronze on day three.

title: Cycling World Championships 2023s: Great Britain win women's team pursuit gold
description: Watch as Katie Archibald, Elinor Barker, Josie Knight and Anna Morris win a brilliant women's team pursuit gold for Great Britain at the World Cycling Championships in Glasgow.

title: Wales 20-9 England: Warren Gatland's side defeat disappointing England in warm-up
description: Wales enjoy victory in the opening World Cup warm-up game against England in Cardiff to leave Steve Borthwick mulling over Monday's tournament selection.

title: Netball World Cup 2023 final: England chasing history against Australia
description: England will be in "new territory" when they face Australia in their maiden World Cup final, says former captain Serena Kersten.

title: Scotland 25-21 France: Hosts hit back for victory despite Zander Fagerson red card
description: Scotland mount a stunning fightback from 18 points down to beat France at Murrayfield.

title: Cycling World Championships 2023: Charlie Hatton wins downhill mountain bike gold for Great Britain
description: Great Britain's Charlie Hatton wins downhill mountain bike gold at the 2023 World Cycling Championships.

title: German city hit by massive hail storm
description: Hail formed 30cm drifts in Reutlingen requiring snowploughs to be deployed, at the height of summer.

title: Chandrayaan-3: Historic India mission enters Moon orbit, aiming for south pole
description: If Chandrayaan-3 succeeds, India will be the first country to land near the Moon's little-explored south pole.

title: Wrexham's Football League return watched by Hugh Jackman
description: Hollywood actor joins celebrity owners to watch Wrexham's return to Football League after 15 years.

title: Kai Cenat: Police plan to charge Twitch streamer after PS5 giveaway mayhem
description: Police say US influencer Kai Cenat could be charged with inciting a riot after chaos in Manhattan.

title: Karen Bardsley: Why this Women's World Cup is more open than ever
description: In Karen Bardsley's latest column, the former England goalkeeper discusses why the Women's World Cup is the most competitive it's ever been.

title: Joe Pasquale impaled in freak moose antler incident in Skegness
description: The comic was given seven stitches and says he is lucky to be alive.

title: Carer shortage: Government urged to 'rocket boost' fostering
description: There are concerns that the number of families who want to foster but then drop out is "very high".

title: Blackpool: Two men arrested after death of baby boy
description: The child was unresponsive when taken to hospital on 27 July and later died, police say.

title: Rasmus Hojlund: Manchester United complete £72m signing from Atalanta
description: Denmark striker Rasmus Hojlund joins Manchester United on a five-year deal from Serie A side Atalanta.

title: Dillian Whyte out of Anthony Joshua fight after adverse test
description: Dillian Whyte returns "an adverse finding" from a doping test, causing his heavyweight rematch against Anthony Joshua to be cancelled.

title: Netball World Cup 2023 Highlights: England beat defending champions New Zealand
description: Watch highlights as England defeat defending champions New Zealand 46-40 to secure a place in their first ever Netball World Cup final.

title: England reach first Netball World Cup final
description: England grind down defending champions New Zealand to make history by reaching their first Netball World Cup final.

title: Netball World Cup 2023: England beat New Zealand to reach final
description: Watch the moment England beat New Zealand 46-40 in a tense match to reach their first Netball World Cup final.

title: Women's World Cup 2023: Japan into quarter finals after Norway win - highlights
description: Watch highlights as Japan take a step closer to a second Women's World Cup title after beating Norway 3-1, to set up a quarter final against either the USA or Sweden.

title: US approves postpartum depression pill
description: Clinical trials showed the drug helped to reduce depressive symptoms in as little as three days.

title: Japan 3-1 Norway: Japanese into World Cup quarter-finals
description: Japan take a step closer to a second Women's World Cup title by beating Norway 3-1 to reach the quarter-finals.

title: Women's World Cup 2023: Hinata Miyazawa calmly nets Japan's third against Norway
description: Japan's Hinata Miyazawa scores her fifth goal of the tournament to secure her side a 3-1 victory over Norway in the last 16 at the Fifa Women's World Cup 2023.

title: Brighton Pride: Train cancellations and wind and rain
description: All rail services in and out of Brighton are cancelled, while Storm Antoni will bring wind and rain.

title: Josko Gvardiol transfer news: Who is Manchester City's £77m signing from RB Leipzig?
description: How will Josko Gvardiol fit in with Manchester City after they complete his big-money signing from RB Leipzig?

title: Imran Khan: Pakistan ex-PM given three-year jail sentence
description: The ousted prime minister was arrested after the verdict centring on a case of corruption he denies.

title: Josko Gvardiol: Manchester City sign Croatia centre-back from RB Leipzig
description: Manchester City sign Croatia centre-back Josko Gvardiol on a five-year deal from RB Leipzig for £77m.

title: Robert Sanchez: Chelsea complete £25m signing of goalkeeper from Brighton
description: Chelsea complete the £25m signing of Spanish goalkeeper Robert Sanchez from Brighton & Hove Albion.

title: Women's World Cup 2023: Spain thrash Switzerland in World Cup
description: Watch highlights as Spain thrash Switzerland 5-1 to reach the quarter-finals of the Women's World Cup for the first time.

title: Marc Marquez: MotoGP great says 'some people around me say it is time to stop'
description: MotoGP rider Marc Marquez on rebuilding his confidence to get back to championship winning ways after years of injuries and crashes

title: New Zealand 23-20 Australia: All Blacks fight back for dramatic win
description: New Zealand stage a dramatic comeback to beat Australia 23-20 and retain their winning form before the Rugby World Cup.

title: Spain put five past Switzerland to reach last eight
description: Spain reach the quarter-finals of the Fifa Women's World Cup for the first time after producing an outstanding display of firepower to send Switzerland out.

title: Urinal appears on the side of Sonning bridge over River Thames
description: The same Sonning bridge has seen previous additions including a post box, front door and telephone.

title: Women's World Cup 2023: Spain's Laia Codina nets own goal to bring Switzerland level
description: Spain's Laia Codina scores an "absolute shocker" of an own goal that brings Switzerland level in their last 16 match at the Fifa Women's World Cup.

title: Texas abortion ban temporarily lifted for medical emergencies
description: Women in the US state with pregnancy complications will be exempted from the abortion ban, a judge rules.

title: Storm Antoni: Danger to life warning as strong winds and heavy rain hits UK
description: The first storm to be named by the Met Office this year is expected to bring gusts of up to 65mph.

title: Russia says tanker hit in Ukrainian attack near Crimea
description: The ship's engine room is damaged after the strike, Russian maritime officials are quoted as saying.

title: Anna Netrebko: Top Russian soprano fired over war sues Met Opera
description: Anna Netrebko was dropped by the Met Opera last year after refusing to denounce Russia's president.

title: Nayland: The cemetery where iron crosses mark people with disabilities
description: How did mangled crosses trigger a revival of interest in care for people with disabilities?
